name: Mantel Clock
maker: Movement by Nicolas-Alexandre Folin, and enamel plaques by Georges-Adrien Merlet
description: Mantel Clock; Movement by Nicolas-Alexandre Folin (French, about 1750 - after 1815, master 1789), and enamel plaques by Georges-Adrien Merlet (French, born 1754); Paris, France; about 1790 - 1800; Gilt bronze; enameled metal; white marble base; glass and gilt metal case; 45.7 x 27.6 x 14 cm (18 x 10 7/8 x 5 1/2 in.); 72.DB.57; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California

medium: Gilt bronze; enameled metal; white marble base; glass and gilt metal case
